lead_paragraph: Winger Chris Ashton will leave Saracens to join French side Toulon for the next season, a move that ends his hopes of a return to the England team.

headline.print_headline: Saracens Wing Ashton to Join Toulon Next Season
headline.main: Saracens Wing Ashton to Join Toulon Next Season
